name: UpdateDatastoreItem
description:
Partially update an item in a datastore by its key.

Use this tool to modify an existing item in a datastore by specifying its key. It's ideal for making incremental changes without altering the entire record, leveraging Datadog's API.

parameters.name: datastore_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the datastore that contains the item to update.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the datastore to retrieve.

parameters.name: update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the item key, item identifier, and the changes to apply. Include key-value pairs to update.

id.description: The unique identifier of the item being updated.

ops_set.description: Set operation that contains key-value pairs to set on the datastore item.

item_changes.description: Changes to apply to a datastore item using set operations.

item_key.description: The primary key that identifies the item to update. Cannot exceed 256 characters.

attributes.description: Attributes for updating a datastore item, including the item key and changes to apply.

id.description: The unique identifier of the datastore item.

type.description: The resource type for datastore items.

data.description: Data wrapper containing the item identifier and the changes to apply during the update operation.
